mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE='메인슬라이드' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM

SELECT ROWNUM, MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS, ROUND(NVL(RATIO_TO_REPORT(TICKET_COUNT) OVER(),0)*100, 2) AS RATIO, NVL(MOVIE_IMG_PATH, 'null') MAIN_POSTER FROM(SELECT P.MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS, MOVIE_IMG_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(TICKET_NO) FROM TICKETING_INFO C WHERE P.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO) TICKET_COUNT FROM MOVIE P LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE='메인슬라이드') I ON(P.MOVIE_NO = I.MOVIE_NO) WHERE SCREENING = 'C' ORDER BY TICKET_COUNT DESC, RELEASE_DATE)
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE='영화슬라이드' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM
SELECT * FROM( SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE = '광고' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) WHERE rownum = 1
SELECT PERSON_NAME FROM PERSON_INFO WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND PERSON_ROLE = '감독'
SELECT PERSON_NAME FROM PERSON_INFO WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND (PERSON_ROLE IS NULL OR PERSON_ROLE != '감독')
SELECT MOVIE_IMG_PATH FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} AND MOVIE_IMG_ROLE = '스틸컷'
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_REVIEW WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "beansGarden".MOVIE_REVIEW (REVIEW_NO, SCORE, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_CONTENT, USER_NO, MOVIE_NO) VALUES(SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, #{score}, SYSDATE, #{reviewContent}, #{userNo}, #{movieNo})
